Articles.Content:
I like the idea of monopropellant engines. However it's quite inconvenient that there is only one size. So I did a quick and dirty CFG change and made a bigger Puff engine. Don't expect anything fancy.

(worst texture quality not included)

Download

That will be so good for Shuttle replicas. I'm missing it when not playing with RO. Good job!
It's nice of you to share it, but TweakScale does the same in-game, without creating new files etc, so you might want to try that one.
